headline: Will UDR's (UDR) Leadership Shift Strengthen Its Strategy or Reveal Growing Pains?
summary: On September 2, 2025, UDR, Inc. announced that Joseph D. Fisher resigned as President and Chief Investment Officer, with Chairman and CEO Tom Toomey stepping in as President and assuming Fisher's responsibilities during the transition period through December 31, 2025. This leadership realignment comes as UDR’s senior management, including Toomey, prepares to engage investors at key real estate industry conferences in September 2025. We'll explore how the transition in executive leadership,...
